name: barbarian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a member of a group of people from a very different country or culture that is considered to be less socially advanced and more violent than your own: The walled city was attacked by barbarian hordes.
disapproving a person with little education who has no interest in art and culture: How can you call those barbarians your friends?
